entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , La Grande-Quatre
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:09 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -7.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: La Grande IV Airport 12:51 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -7.0°C
Pressure: 100.1 kPa
Visibility: 3.2 km
Humidity: 59 %
Wind Chill: -17
Dewpoint: -13.7°C
Wind: S 39 km/h gust 54 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 18 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Snow ending overnight then partly cloudy. Local blowing snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 16.
